name: Cards with links on the site
description:
Cards with links on the site


Here is a fast example of the card with a link.

The card itself is an information block, an interface element that works as a preview of more detailed content. It contains key information and serves as a link to a page with more detailed information.


The main advantage of the card is its versatility. It is suitable for any theme and occasion, for different platforms and devices. A properly designed card (which traces the logic of the content) improves the UX of the site or application.


What can be shown with cards:

  • A series of articles on the main page of the blog
  • List of vacancies
  • Works in the portfolio
  • Questions and Answers (FAQ)
  • Agency Services
  • Destinations for a travel agency
  • Real estate objects on the developer's website
  • Table of contents for recipes
  • Rooms of a mini-hotel or hostel
  • Styles in Dance school
  • Longrid Navigation
